message: We walk for a while in silence. Eventually, the scenery turns familiar.
The thought nearly brings tears to my eyes.
Just as the store comes into view, a shadow falls over me.
Is he okay? He landed face first...
But a second later, he jumps up and embraces me.

name: クリア
message: "Master! I'm so glad to see you! Where did you go?!"

name: クリア
message: "As long as you're safe! Last night, I heard your voice from far away. I was so worried!"

Last night...
That's when Mink kidnapped me.
